data.text: Kɨ ghaze,
Kamaghɨn deragham,
Ikiavɨra Itir God na ikaragha ghaze:
“Ia gumazamiziba kamaghɨn fogh, ian namakaba ko aveghbuaba ifara,
Gumazamiziba bar moghɨra uan adarazigh ifara,
Me uarira uari abɨrir arazim gamua ghuavɨra ikia,
Kamaghɨn, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim mɨgɨa ghaze:
Men mɨzeba, mati barir gumazibagh asi me ariaghɨriba.
Bar guizbangɨra, kɨ gumazamizir kabar arazir kuraba ikarvaghɨva,
Kɨ Jeremaia, kɨ garima,
Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God na mɨgɨa ghaze,
Ezɨ kɨ Jeremaia kamaghɨn Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨgei,
Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God a ikaragha ghaze:
Men navir averiaba gavgavigha uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua
Kamaghɨn, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, Israelian God, kɨ ghaze,
Kɨ me batuegh me amadaghtɨ, me mangɨ
Egha Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Ezɨ gumazamiziba kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Guizbangɨra, Saionɨn nguibar ekiamɨn aven,
Ezɨ kɨ ghaze:
“Ovevem e batogha gɨfa.
Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨkɨmasa na mɨgɨa ghaze,
Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze:
Gumazim bar akueghsɨ, a bizir bar vamɨra bagh bar akongegham. Bizir kam kamakɨn:
“Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze,
Ia nguibar kabar gumaziba,
